resources.string: Cha-Ching Exchange is a simple and easy to use live currency converter, aimed at anyone who requires live Exchange rate information for up to 32 world currencies. It also has offline functionality for anyone travelling abroad, or simply out of coverage range where live information is not available. Instructions Simply enter the amount you want to convert, choose a base currency. Main menu options Currency chooser: Result currencies can be turned off and on. Offline mode: This toggles offline mode Clear offline cache: Removes ALL offline data for all currencies Clear pinned currencies: If you have pinned any favourite currencies then this option clears all the pins (see below for pinning a currency) Currency menu options Pin Currency: This option allows you to ‘pin’ any favourite currencies. Pressing the ‘pin toggle’ in the menu quickly and easily switches between the two Set as base currency: Changes the current base currency Remove offline cache: This option will remove individual offline currency data (available offline data for each currency is denoted by the download symbol) If you have any questions or feedback please email: treefrogapplications@gmail.com
